DOC.brief_summary: This study test immunogenicity , safety , tolerability VARIVAX™ manufacture Varicella Enhanced Process ( VEP ) compare VARIVAX™ 2007 Process . The primary hypothesis test 1 ) VARIVAX™ VEP induce varicella-zoster virus ( VZV ) antibody responses non-inferior induced VARIVAX™ 2007 process 6 week vaccination 1 , 2 ) VARIVAX™ VEP induce acceptable anti-VZV antibody response rate 6 week vaccination 1 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Immunogenicity , Safety , Tolerability VARIVAX™ Manufactured With New Process ( V210-062 )
DOC.criteria: negative clinical history measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster receive measles , mumps , rubella , varicella vaccine time prior study , anticipate receive vaccine outside study congenital acquire immune deficiency , neoplastic disease , depressed immunity receive systemic immunomodulatory steroid within 3 month prior enter study expect require throughout study history allergy anaphylactoid reaction neomycin , gelatin , sorbital , egg protein , chicken protein , component MMR™ II VARIVAX™ receive salicylate within 14 day prior study vaccination expose measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster 4 week prior study vaccination receive nonlive vaccine within 14 day prior study vaccination expect receive vaccine 42day period study vaccination receive live vaccine within 30 day prior study vaccination expect receive vaccine 42day period study vaccination receive immune globulin , blood transfusion , bloodderived product within 5 month prior study vaccination fever illness ( ≥102.2°F [ 39.0°C ] ) within 72 hour prior study vaccination bear human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infect mother participate clinical trial ( surveillance study ) within 30 day prior study enrollment
